A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: LOVED The Last Jedi. Well done! If I was to divide the movie into 4 parts\, I would give the first part an A\, the second part a C\, the third part an A+\, and the 4th part an A+. Overall\, I give it an A. The C is from the \"Casino\" scenes with Finn. Was way tooooo long\, and could have accomplished what was needed for the story line without a lot of the extra stuff. Killed the momentum\, but fully recovered for the 3rd and 4th parts of the film.
